name: "E Peterbus Unum" Online Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What does Cleveland buy with his tax refund?
questions.explanation:
A trampoline.

	Everyone on Spooner Street gets a tax refund except Peter.  Quagmire gets the doll and Joe gets the TV so he can watch Steven Seagal movies without waking Bonnie.

questions.text: Peter gets a larger tax refund than anyone on Spooner Street.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Peter actually gets an audit and has to go to the IRS.  Peter actually thought he was getting an Audi.  He was originally going to use the tax refund money to buy a pool.

questions.text: What does Lois serve to the family when Peter digs his pool?
questions.explanation:
Iced tea.

	Peter decides to build his own pool after not receiving his tax refund, but he hits the power line for Quahog and cuts off everyone's power.

questions.text: How many years has Peter been living at Spooner Street?
questions.explanation:
Twelve.

	Peter had thought he'd been part of the United States for twelve years, but it turns out that he wasn't a part of any country.

questions.text: What does Mayor Adam West like to eat?
questions.explanation:
Taffy.

	Mayor Adam West says that he loves his job more than he loves his taffy, but he's still a man who enjoys his taffy.  Adam West has to kick Peter out of his office when he thought Peter was a communist.

questions.text: What does Peter name his new country?
questions.explanation:
Petoria.

	Peter was originally going to call his country Peterland, but a bar at the airport already had the name.  Peter gets diplomatic immunities and doesn't pay for anything.

questions.text: What country's delegate does Peter sit beside in the United Nations?
questions.explanation:
Albania.

	Peter complains that he has to sit in the nosebleed section and asks to be moved to the front row.  The head of the United Nations asks if Peter also wants a satellite that will scratch his butt from space.

questions.text: When Peter invades Joe's pool, what country does not send him a telegram?
questions.explanation:
Afghanistan.

	Peter decides to invite all of his allied countries over to "Johio" for a pool party.  Johio is the name Peter gave to Joe's house when he invaded it.

questions.text: What does Peter want to have if he doesn't get to stay a country?
questions.explanation:
A pen.

	Peter asks for Adam West's pen which the office has millions of, but Adam West doesn't let him have it anyways.  In the end, Peter gets nothing.

questions.text: Does Mr. Weed appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Mr. Weed dances with everyone when Peter is singing his own version of "Can't Touch This" by M.C. Hammer.  Mr. Weed doesn't speak in the episode, but he appears.
